mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CPN_CITY.CPN_CD AS cpnCd /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CPN_CITY.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CPN_CITY.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CPN_CITY.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CPN_CITY /* 쿠폰 도시 */ ,EZC_CPN /* 쿠폰 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CPN_CITY.CPN_CD = EZC_CPN.CPN_CD AND EZC_CPN_CITY.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CPN.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CPN_CITY.CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND EZC_CPN_CITY.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CPN_CITY /* 쿠폰 도시 */ ,EZC_CPN /* 쿠폰 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CPN_CITY.CPN_CD = EZC_CPN.CPN_CD AND EZC_CPN_CITY.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CPN.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_CPN_CITY.CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CPN_CITY.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_CPN_CITY.CPN_CD AS cpnCd /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CPN_CITY.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CPN_CITY.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CPN_CITY.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CPN_CITY /* 쿠폰 도시 */ ,EZC_CPN /* 쿠폰 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CPN_CITY.CPN_CD = EZC_CPN.CPN_CD AND EZC_CPN_CITY.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CPN.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_CPN_CITY.CPN_CD = #{param.cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CPN_CITY.CITY_CD = #{param.cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
ORDER BY EZC_CPN_CITY.CPN_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CPN_CITY SET /* 쿠폰 도시 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CPN_CITY /* 쿠폰 도시 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
